# playerScope

**Instance Property**

A filter that restricts the search to a subset of the players in Game Center.

## Declaration

```swift
var playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope { get set }
```

## Discussion

GameKit ignores the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/playerScope-swift.property] property if the leaderboard request initializes using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/init(playerIDs:)] method. Otherwise, the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/playerScope-swift.property] property determines which players to include in the request for high scores. The default is [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/PlayerScope-swift.enum/global]. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/PlayerScope-swift.enum] for more information.

## Deprecated properties

- **category**: The named leaderboard to retrieve information from.
- **identifier**: The named leaderboard to retrieve information from.
- **isLoading**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the leaderboard object is retrieving scores.
- **localPlayerScore**: The score that the local player earns.
- **maxRange**: The size of the leaderboard.
- **range**: The numerical score rankings to return from the search.
- **scores**: An array of scores that contains the scores that the search returns.
- **timeScope**: A filter that restricts the search to scores within a specific period of time.
